lyrics_features.cleaned_text: Comin to ya on a dusty road Good lovin I got a truck load And when you get it you got something So dont worry cause Im coming I'm a soul man I'm a soul man I'm a soul man I'm a soul man Got what I got the hard way And Ill make it better each and every day So honey dont you fret Cause you aint seen nothing yet I'm a soul man I'm a soul man Play it Steve! I'm a soul man I'm a soul man Listen I was brought up on a side street I learned how to love before I could eat I was educated from good stock When I start lovin I just can't stop I'm a soul man I'm a soul man I'm a soul man I'm a soul man Well grab the rope and Ill pull you in Give you hope and be your only boyfriend Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah I'm a soul man I'm a soul man You're a soul man I'm a soul man I'm a soul man I'm a soul man
